The two ways to become heirs in the teac: Become heirs in material things, not in the teaching
Become heirs in the teaching, not in material things
The three grounds for criticism/praise o: The disciples of a teacher who lives in seclusion do not train in seclusion
They don’t give up what the Teacher tells them to give up
They’re indulgent and slack, leaders in backsliding, neglecting seclusion
